pages.title: Kamen Rider Skull
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider × Kamen Rider W & Decade: Movie War 2010 (2009, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:w/devices/lostdriver#lostdriver_skull)Lostdriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Resistance$(li)Jump Boost III$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)
